text: Herbert Lindner (born 15 September 1952) is an Austrian fencer. He competed in the individual and team épée events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. == References == Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian male fencers Category:Austrian épée fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Austria Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Vienna
title: Herbert Lindner
